en.title: Complete

rule.title: Winning rules
rule.rules: Pick 6 red beans and 1 blue bean as your quiz number
rule.firstPrize: First prize：6 red beans match perfectly
rule.secondPrize: Second prize: 5 red beans + 1 blue bean match
rule.thirdPrize: Third prize: 4 red beans + 1 blue bean match or 5 red beans match
rule.fourthPrize: Fourth prize: 3 red beans + 1 blue bean match or 4 red beans match
rule.fifthPrize: Fifth prize: match the number of blue beans
rule.sixthPrize: Sixth Prize: Matching the numbers before and after the blue bean
rule.example: （For example, if the blue bean is 4, then the 3 or 5 won）

message.noUser: This phone number is not registeyellow in 喜豆. Do you want join the 喜豆?

en.appDownMessage: You can check more information through mobile App.

ko.title: 응모완료

rule.title: 승리 규칙
rule.rules: 퀴즈 번호로 6 개의 팥과 1 개의 파란색 콩 선택
rule.secondPrize: 2 등상: 팥 5 개 + 푸른 콩 1 개
rule.thirdPrize: 3 등상: 팥 4 개 + 푸른 콩 1 개 또는 팥 5 개 일치
rule.fourthPrize: 4 등상: 팥 3 개 + 푸른 콩 1 개 또는 팥 4 개 일치
rule.sixthPrize: 6 등: 푸른 콩 전후의 숫자 매치

message.noUser: 가입되지 않은 사용자 입니다. 회원 가입을 진행하시겠습니까?

zh.title: 竞猜完成

rule.title: 中奖规则
rule.rules: 挑选6颗红豆与一颗蓝豆作为你的竞猜号码
rule.firstPrize: 一等奖：6颗红豆完全匹配
rule.secondPrize: 二等奖：5颗红豆+1颗蓝豆匹配
rule.thirdPrize: 三等奖：4颗红豆+1颗蓝豆匹配或者5颗红豆匹配
rule.fourthPrize: 四等奖：3颗红豆+1颗蓝豆匹配或者4颗红豆匹配
rule.fifthPrize: 五等奖：与蓝豆的数字相匹配
rule.sixthPrize: 六等奖：与蓝豆前后的数字相匹配
rule.example: （比如蓝豆是4，则选3号或5号中奖）

phone.title: 确认注册与否
phone.button: 留下手机号，让大奖砸中你

message.noUser: 加入喜豆大军，完成竞猜30000元大奖就差一步
message.noUser2: 您已经这么幸运，为什么不继续呢？
